guidanceItem.title: Sample Applications Are Removed
guidanceItem.content:
Applies to

  • Web Application

What to Check For

Check to ensure that sample applications are removed to reduce the areas where your web server can be attacked.

Why

Sample applications are typically not configured with high degrees of security. It is possible that an attacker could exploit an inherent weakness in a sample application or in its configuration to attack your Web site.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
